learning_objectives.description: Round values to a specified degree of accuracy.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Includes decimal places and significant figures. e.g. Write 5764 correct to the nearest thousand.

learning_objectives.description: Make estimates for calculations involving numbers, quantities and measurements.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: e.g. By writing each number correct to 1 significant figure, estimate the value of 41.3 / (9.79 Ã— 0.765).

learning_objectives.description: Round answers to a reasonable degree of accuracy in the context of a given problem.
